features: BABY WIPES: Boogie Wipes are wet wipes for baby and kids that are made with natural saline, which is gentle on skin, helps clean and dissolve snot and boogers, and wipes away dirt and germs They're gentle enough to be used on noses, faces, fingers and toes whenever cleaning is necessary
SOFT and GENTLE BABY WIPES: Soothe and moisturize with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E so wipes are extra soft, safe and gentle for all ages
MADE WITH NATURAL SALINE: Made with 09 percent isotonic saline, which is the same amount of saline that naturally occurs in the human body Hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, parabens, and phthalates
RESEALABLE PACK: Hard, flip-top lid is resealable and keeps wipes fresh for every day use or for use on stuffy noses when allergy, cold and flu symptoms are at their worst
INVENTED BY MOMS: Invented by moms for moms, and also recommended by pediatricians;
UNSCENTED BABY WIPES: With no added fragrances

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safe & gentle for all ages Soothe and moisturize with extra soft wipes made with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E. Isotonic Saline Our patented saline formula is made with 0.9% isotonic saline, which is the same amount of saline that naturally occurs in the human body Flip-top lid keeps wipes fresh Perfect for stuffy noses when allergy, cold and flu symptoms are at their worst Hypoallergenic Free of alcohol, parabens, and phthalates. Available in unscented and scents kids love!

Boogie No-Rub Diaper Rash Spray Boogie Organic Diaper Balm Boogie Antibacterial Hand Wipes Boogie Hand Sanitizer Spray Boogie Balm What It Does Helps treat & prevent diaper rash Mosturizes and nourishes skin to help prevent dryness and chapping Wipes away dirt, germs and bacteria when soap and water are not available. Quickly decreases bacteria on the hands and body Mosturizes and nourishes skin to help prevent dryness and chapping

Boogie Bath Bombs Boogie Bath Salts Boogie Bubble Bath Boogie Insect Repellent Lotion Boogie Sunscreen Stick What It Does Soothes and comforts Soothes and comforts Helps soothe, comfort and relieve when congestion, cold, flu and allergy symptoms are at their worst. Provides broad-spectrum protection for the whole family and effectively repels mosquitoes and ticks for up to 14 hours. Contains 20% Picaridin, No DEET Provides broad spectrum SPF 50 to help prevent sunburn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Solution for Gentle Cleansing!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I can't express how pleased I am with the Saline Wipes by Boogie – these wipes have truly become a household essential! Offering a level of comfort and care that goes beyond typical wipes, these are a standout product deserving of a solid 5-star rating.The inclusion of natural saline, along with Vitamin E, Aloe, and Chamomile, sets these wipes apart. They provide a gentle and soothing touch, making them perfect for the face, hands, body, and, of course, the nose. The natural ingredients contribute to a refreshing and non-irritating experience, even for those with sensitive skin.One of the standout features is the practicality of these wipes. Whether dealing with seasonal allergies, the aftermath of playtime, or simply in need of a quick refresh, Boogie Wipes deliver. The packaging is convenient and travel-friendly, ensuring that these wipes are always within reach when needed.The wipes are generously moist without being overly saturated, and they have a subtle and pleasant fragrance. They effectively cleanse and refresh, leaving a clean and moisturized feeling. I appreciate that they are FSA/HSA eligible, making it even more convenient to incorporate into our healthcare routine.As a parent, I particularly love how these wipes make boogies and messes a breeze to clean up. They're gentle enough for my little one's delicate skin but effective in tackling various cleaning needs. The durability of the wipes ensures they don't tear easily, providing a reliable solution for daily use.In conclusion, Saline Wipes by Boogie are a must-have for every household. Whether you're a parent, dealing with allergies, or just seeking a refreshing wipe for various purposes, these wipes deliver on every front. I wholeheartedly give them a 5-star rating – they've certainly earned their place in our daily routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY, BUY, BUY...one of the best multi-purpose products on the market!!!! I would give this item 10 STARS (if I could)
reviews.reviewText: As a nurse, I know the use of saline is commonplace in almost all wound care. In fact, in many-if not most all surgeries, saline is the irrigation used for it's antibacterial qualities.THIS IS A BIGGIE WITH ME-and one of the many reasons I love this product.On another note,I wouldn't write what I am going to say next if you knew me, because it would be bragging in a way...but since you don't know me, I can honestly say I have a very young looking face-very fair skin-and rarely use make-up (I am in my mid-40's, and am post-menopausal). I have worked hard at keeping my skin pure looking...and one of my keys is NEVER EVER touching my face with my hands unless I have washed my hands well.With that said, These "BOOGIE WIPES" are a miracle 'wipe'....The ingredients not only have saline--[and that antibacterial quality is TOPS on my list]...BUT what makes these even better is that added to these is VITAMIN E and ALOE...other mainstays for my facial care.I will forevermore use these as my "wet wipe" of choice not only for my face (for the 'in between' washing times), but keep them in my purse at all times for hand wipes, use in public bathrooms, and basically wiping off anything I sit on, eat off of, etc.I also am keeping a pack in my bathroom for feminine hygiene and basic freshen up moments when in a hurry.Great to even clean your ears with...I can only imagine they are wonderful for babies and children....I haven't tried the grape-but am sure they are another plus when needing to use them with children. (I will say though, the 'fresh scent' is mild and truly appealing).I cannot emphasize as a professional and a consumer, what an amazing combination is found in these wipes....and is a true 'find' with the purpose to use for the original intent of wiping runny noses that need those "crusties" and tender spots addressed.I am taking this time to write this lengthy review because I never want these to go out of production....so BUY, BUY, BUY!!!!I wish stores like TARGET or WALMART, etc. would keep these with the facial care products...as you will need to go to the baby section to find them. They could actually be placed in several department of any store as these.At TARGET, one pack was about $4...However, I was able to find 3 packs-of 30 wipes each for about $10 online.I strongly recommend these...keep a pack in your car for sticky fingers, in your purse, in your bathroom....even with your cleaning products!I often wipe off a door handle or my cell with them when I am done...Safe....ANTIBACTERIAL, and soothing (VITAMIN E and ALOE).PLUS, with all the "bugs" we are facing today, you could never go wrong.Another thought as well...they would be a great replacement for antiseptic gels....for in my opinion, those gels are so harsh, they dry your skin, causing cracks which just strip you as one of your first lines of defense...being unbroken skin... (Even a paper cut can turn into an infection).Also, because these are wipes, versus a gel, they can be used to wipe underneath your fingernails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these boogie wipes for my kid. They are so soft with the moistness in them that it doesn’t hurt their nose when you wipe boogies off. And they smell good. We always have these on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love these
reviews.reviewText: We love these boogie wipes! They are great for all ages. I use the nose frida and then these boogie wipes to wipe them away. They are also useful for infant sticky eye. It doesn’t burn or sting skin or eyes. We have sensitive skin and this has not dried out our babies skin. They are gentle and effective. Honestly I’ve also used them as hand wipes and diaper wipes when I had nothing else. And I’ve used them on my own nose too. A must have, in my book. id recommend giving these to a mom to be even if it’s not on her registry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for snotty nosed kids
reviews.reviewText: Works great with snotty noses and to wipe off hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: These work well as cleaning wipes on the go for messy faces / sticky lil hands. My baby has sensitive skin and no irritation with these on face. Gentle use of course. They smell ok. They’re not too soft , they basically feel like a regular wet wipe to me but smaller with a different formula for the wet. I like these enough to buy again, but of course I’m using our health savings flex money. Just good for travel or at home convenience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are Great!
reviews.reviewText: We use these often and they seem to not irritate the nose as much as regular wipes. The scent is a little strong but they work great. My baby has sensitive skin and did not break out from them so we recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice alternative to tissues
reviews.reviewText: Used a few of my nephews during flu season and it was really refreshing.Tissues was scratching my nose making it really red and sensitive and this was really soothing.Felt clean if I had a lot of mucus/ phlegm - it did not soak through like regular tissue.I leave a pack in my room, desk and car.

I buy these for my little girl who is 9 months old. She’s had a few colds and these are literally nose-savers! I’ve used Kleenex a few times instead and it irritates/dries out her nose almost right away, but the Boogie Wipes are so soft and gentle, she doesn’t mind me wiping as much. My only complaint is that each sheet is a bit big, so I actually rip them in half for less waste.

reviews.reviewTitle: No estoy de acuerdo con la compra
reviews.reviewText: En esta foto aparecen que se entregan 6 paquetes y me llego 1 no estoy de acuerdo en el monto pagado por 1 solo paqueteDe verdad espero que me contesten y me ayuden con el producto que falto

From natural ingredients, to MADE IN USA, these wipe are incredible come flu-season. I use them on my infant along with my toddler, and I can't think of any better product. The scent worried me at first because they smell SO good, but no reaction to the NATURAL ingredients. 8 thumbs up.
